column3: Traffic;Tbong Khmom: (Preliminary Information) Local media has reported that a truck which crashed into property along National Road No. 7
column5: has killed at least two people------The incident occurred at 8:20 am on April 19
column6: 2019.------The Tbong Khmum District Police Inspection have so far refused to comment to journalists.------ ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/432232
